summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.8°C) and outside temperature (down 3.7°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm) and cloud levels (up 658 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1607 m), and light levels (up 4303 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 658.0m lower than yesterday, 574.6m lower than the past week, 1607.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1066.2m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and little or no wind. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and periods of sunshine are expected. Changeable conditions.
